conversion_verification.notes: Second image is a true cutaway 3D/isometric render with visible wall height/thickness, interior volume, and multiple wall faces (top/side) exposed by roof removal.

3d_conversion_fundamentals.notes: Strong 3D extrusion, clear floor-vs-wall separation, correct angled view, and clean cutaway with readable interior volumes.

geometric_accuracy.notes: Overall layout matches well: kitchen/living at left, bedroom at upper right, central bath/closet zone, and stair block on right. Minor mismatches/uncertainty in exact opening placement/count and some partition proportions.

interior_elements.notes: Major furniture and fixtures are present and placed in correct zones (bedroom bed, living seating/table, kitchen counters/island, bathroom fixtures). Minor simplification and slight scale/orientation ambiguity in small rooms.

visual_clarity.notes: Geometry is clean and readable with good lighting; however, text labels on the floor reduce presentation cleanliness.

detected_errors.description: Some door/window opening placement/count appears slightly inconsistent or not fully verifiable relative to the 2D plan (minor opening fidelity uncertainty).
Text labels ('Kitchen/Living', 'Bedroom') are present in the 3D render, reducing presentation/background score.

summary: A true isometric cutaway 3D conversion with strong layout fidelity to the 2D plan and only minor opening/detail and presentation-label issues.
